Deduce an equivalence from two implications.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-1993.)  Revised to prove it from ~ impbid21d .  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 3-Nov-2012.)

 Deduce an equivalence from two implications.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 3-Nov-2012.)
statement:
impbid.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
impbid.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ch -> ps ) ) $.
impbid $p |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
